lenders.name: Arundhati Roy Supporters
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info:
WeRoy.org is a site that helps to distribute a free 60-minute documentary film called "We", which features the words of award winning author, peace activist and humanitarian, Arundhati Roy. The film can be downloaded and viewed online for free. However, for those who would like a television quality version, a DVD disc is also available for as low as a $5 donation. After production and shipping costs, we have a little left over from each donation. In the spirit of Ms. Roy's humanitarian work, that extra change is pooled and used to directly help many of the people she fights for in the developing world, through Kiva.

"Today the world is run by three of the most secretive institutions in the world: The International Monetary Fund, the World Bank, and the World Trade Organization, all three of which, in turn, are dominated by the U.S. Their decisions are made in secret. The people who head them are appointed behind closed doors. Nobody really knows anything about them, their politics, their beliefs, their intentions. Nobody elected them. Nobody said they could make decisions on our behalf." - Arundhati Roy

lenders.loan_because: we are all one......

lenders.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur I understand what it takes to start a business from zero; to build a business where there was nothing before; to embrace a work ethic that is not limited to regular working hours. My company is at http://www.InformationSecurityCanada.com and my work is entirely focused on helping organizations and governments to protect their most valuable assets: people and information. It is the best way I know how to make a positive difference on a bigger scale. It is also a reason why the Kiva model appeals so much to me. I welcome your email (Claudiu@InformaticaSecurity.com).

lenders.name: Valerie
lenders.loan_because:
I am a pastor therefore in order to subsidize my salary and not to burden the church I sell men and women clothes. My business was doing extremely well in AL from 1998 to 2002. However, when I moved to North Carolina (to obtain my Master of Divinity) my clients dropped and I have not been able to get enough money to buy inventory.  

I need a loan in order for me to have a website so I can reach my out of town customers (200+.) I also need a stock onhand so I can obtain new customers in NC.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a pastor of a small church and the tithes from my business help the church and with aloan I can help people obtain the clothing they desire at a reasonable cost.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: All people are my brothers and sisters.  I'm not rich, but I have enough money to have a decent life and I want the same for everyone.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I like to help entrepreneurs.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: Berkeley, CA

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: It is great knowing who I am lending to, and watching the business grow and progress.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach economics to college and university undergraduates. I especially love to teach introductory courses to students who have not taken econ before. I am very lucky to be in an environment where new ideas are respected, valued, and shared among people. I learn at least as much from my students as they do from me.

lenders.name: Lawrie Savage
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to give an opportunity to hard working people in developing countries.  It gives them a chance to improve their lives and the lives of their families in a way that should be much more satisfying and sustainable than mere charity.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant who helps governments in emerging market countries to modernize their laws and other procedures designed to ensure that the country\'s financial institutions and pension funds provide reliable security for the individuals and businesses in the country. (Picture is of my daughter at Moraine Lake, in the Canadian Rockies near Calgary)

lenders.name: D.R.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people realize their dream.
lenders.occupational_info: High paced and varied

lenders.name: Barney & Shannon
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Shirley & Rick
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we heard about how valuable such loans can be, especially through the work of Muhammad Yunus.  It is one of the most exciting ways we know of for helping others. Children from well-off families should all be given a gift certificate to get them started early in life.
lenders.occupational_info: Rick is an artist.  He does painting, photography, video art, poetry & journalism.

lenders.name: jeremy
lenders.occupational_info: research in a inorganic chemistry lab

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It's good to help others bootstrap their way up - it helps them and their local economy both!

lenders.name: Bud
lenders.loan_because: I'm too poor to give.
lenders.occupational_info: Take in homeless animals and find good homes for them.

lenders.name: Sharon Teklu
lenders.loan_because: I believe in making a difference in the life of the one's who need it most. As Norman B. Rice once said "Dare to reach out your hand into the darkness, to pull another hand into the light".

lenders.name: Chris Rosebrugh
lenders.loan_because: small business makes the world go around

lenders.name: Kati
lenders.loan_because: it's a simple way to share 1st-world wealth, and it seems to have some accountability built in.
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher, translator, indexer

lenders.name: Spike
lenders.loan_because: I don't have to.

lenders.name: Mathews Family
lenders.loan_because: we can and it's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because: it brings me joy!!!

lenders.name: Nancy & Dale
lenders.loan_because: We are happy to be able to loan people the financial assistance they determine they need so that they can make choices, support themselves, their family, and feel successful. This results in becoming an asset and valued contributing member of the community.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of microfinance and think it provides a form of sustainable development.
lenders.occupational_info: Training to be a radiologist.

lenders.name: Corey and Katie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good and they are fun gifts to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: Corey works in nonprofit technology helping organizations raise money and awareness on the Internet.   Katie is a massage therapist, helping people heal with her her hands.

lenders.name: Michigan Trese
lenders.loan_because: Banks don\'t like giving mico loans.  Hardworking people deserve a chance to better their situation.

lenders.name: Malou & Alonzo
lenders.loan_because: A real meaningful way to help...   Impressed with the loan repayment record of past borrowers.

lenders.name: Henry Harlow
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have been born in the USA.  I am committed to building the economies of the rest of the world so everyone can enjoy a better quality of life.  I think small business is one of the most viable ways to improve the quality of life inside and outside the USA.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach attorneys how to increase their income while they reduce their work hours so they can serve their clients better than ever.

lenders.name: Marcy
lenders.loan_because: I live and work in a developing country, and I see how just a little money/confidence in work ability makes a big difference in a family's way of life.

lenders.name: scootssalutes
lenders.loan_because: Diversity is a great thing!

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help disabled people prove to the U.S. government that they are eligible for disability payments.

lenders.name: R&R
lenders.occupational_info: check out  www.innocenceproject.org

lenders.name: Clifford & Trish
lenders.loan_because: The world can\'t be a good place if we have so much and everybody else has so little.We want to help people that are trying to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in one of the hardest businesses to make money. I work long intense hours and manage many diverging viewpoints.I am a commercial electrical project manager.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I don\'t deserve the money that I have any more than these entrepreneurs deserve not to have the chance to provide for themselves and their families with dignity.

lenders.name: lowell
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the vaue of a helping hand for hardworking people
lenders.occupational_info: I lend money to build buildings

lenders.name: Aaron & Sarah
lenders.occupational_info: He designs buildings, and she helps people with mental illness.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Because it will overjoy me to see this business flourish and know that I contributed to making it happen.

lenders.name: jiseon
lenders.loan_because: I wanna help who needs help. even though I can do only this. and I believe they will gain a little hope and get warm.
lenders.occupational_info: the train signal is to control train traffiic automatically. you can reckon that is automatic control system related with trains.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Cliché, but it is better to teach to fish than to give someone fish.  In this case I believe this is an amazing way to help people to build their own environment into a self sustaining economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to build software applications for use by businesses.

lenders.name: Vinod
lenders.loan_because: We like to see our money make a difference in people's lives

lenders.name: John & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: hopefully it helps.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I love seeing other people succeed.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I have been intrigued with the idea of microlending for years, but until I read about Kiva in GOOD magazine I didn\'t know I could do it myself - I love the idea of being able to help alter the roots of poverty instead of just targeting the symptoms of poverty with charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I research hunger and poverty in the US and am currently working on my dissertation researching how social support from friends and family affect hunger.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I want women to have more economic power and personal power in the world. I am grateful to be able to my small part to make more opportunities for my sisters around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: I\'m a Life Coach.  I help people change their lives and find their authentic voice and personal power; teach communication skills and believe in people.  I used to be a nonsmokers\' rights advocate and worked to eliminate secondhand smoke from public places through policy change; now I help individuals and couples make healthy changes in their lives.

lenders.name: Stacey
lenders.loan_because: I was given the gift to loan.......
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children in San Diego, California.  Currently I teach 5th grade.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I would like some of my income to go to helping others especially as my US tax dollars are often spent on causes that I do not agree with.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist hospitalized patients with corrdination of their health care.

lenders.name: Zach Hoffman
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do. I am 16 years old and fortunate enough to live in the United States where I can go to school and have the opportunity to be whatever I want to be. To whom much is given, much is expected.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Sophomore in High School. I go to classes every day and practice sports after school. I want to go to college and then to Law School.

lenders.name: Anne & Mike Woods
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people help themselves, and this seems like a great way to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: Patent lawyer is like a middleman between inventors and the public. She/he helps to protect the inventions while making them available for the public to use.

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: I received the money as a wonderful gift certificate allowing me to help someone in the world to have a little better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with an interfaith group that advocates for children and families in the state of California,USA.

lenders.name: cem
lenders.loan_because: I like helping individuals. This program gives me hope  in the human race.

lenders.name: Jenny & Chris
lenders.loan_because: Grassroots lending to specific people.  A valid way an individual can activate positve change around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Nurse

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: this is such a delightful way to help folks and feel personally connected. \r\n\r\nThanks to Kiva for making it possible.

lenders.name: sandeep sonny
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good....
lenders.occupational_info: im a doctor

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I run my own business and I want to support others to realize that same dream.

lenders.name: Rachele
lenders.loan_because: It's a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people to get healthy and stay healthy, naturally.

lenders.name: Walter
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to be a blessing
lenders.occupational_info: preacher, healer

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.occupational_info: I run a conservation nonprofit organization called Pura Vida Conservation.

lenders.name: Jaki & Paul
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people outside of our community.

lenders.name: Rosetta
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life.

lenders.name: Putty & Ollie
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great idea, people helping themselves.   And when they pay back the loan, they're helping out the next guy too.

lenders.name: Wedge
lenders.loan_because: I think that we, in America, should look out to people in impoverished places.  I have traveled to other countries and seen how people live.  I want to help in any way possible and I want these people to live life to the fullest.  I am not rich but just above being in need and I still would not be able to live like these poor people.  Americans suck it up and help the world we arent the only people in this world and I want you to see that.  To these people who donate: you have my deepest gratitude and to the recipeints: I hope with my heart you make it to your goal.

lenders.name: Zac
lenders.loan_because: Because I believe in the middle class and in capitalism. I believe in human beings being able to make their lives better if they have the initiative and a little help. This is one of those rare activities that benefits everyone involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English in Madrid, Spain.

lenders.name: bonnie
lenders.loan_because: My family and I have realized that purchasing material items for each other is not progressive for the larger picture of the world community.  We now pool our money together once a year (for Christmas) and find a credible organization through which we can contribute.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a high school English teacher.  I teach reading, writing, research, and critical thinking skills to inner-city high school kids.

lenders.name: WordontheStreetPhotos.org
lenders.occupational_info: WordontheStreetPhotos.org is dedicated to connecting and giving a voice to the growing global community of socially, environmentally, and politically conscious people.

lenders.name: The Stave Family
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Brad works in marketing and communications for VisionFund International.  Beccy teaches science courses at a community college. Jeremy is two and loves trains.  Greta is brand new and loves milk.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: A fulfilling job is a path to happiness for many people.

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because:
because I can. because I am a woman, working hard to run my own company and want to support other women doing the same. I believe deeply in helping others help themselves.

I am thankful that i can help.

lenders.name: Nate
lenders.loan_because: This is where compassion seems to meet capitalism and take some of the edge off of global economics.  All without government involvement.  I dig that.

lenders.name: Therese
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the business department of a law firm.

lenders.name: pankaj & elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: We would like to be abel to help as many people with a plan and as we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Pankaj is an electrical engineer and Elizabeth is an opera singer.

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: I want to support developing businesses in developing countries. An amount of money that means very little here can be worth a great deal more somewhere else, and it only makes sense to put it to use where it will do the most good.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain computer systems, keeping them in good repair and fixing them when they fail.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: small businesses are a great source of economic stability.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest Professional Services Organization in the world as a Knowledge Manager.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My cat told me to...and he was right about the dog...so, I have to think he's on to something...
lenders.occupational_info: Tedious hours of boredom punctuated by moments of sheer terror.

lenders.name: MIcca
lenders.loan_because: To be truly human, we all should help in kindness whenever we can.

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.loan_because: I have a safe and secure life working at something that started out 28 years ago as a hobby.  So I am incredibly lucky.  I want to spread the luck across the world.  I also want my children to be involved in this work and they will join me in deciding the best use of the loan money.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an IT Project Manager in major financial institutions that make excessive profits ( larger than a lot of countries GDP )that far outweigh their importance to the world. Basically I have a good idea how to get I.T. project work organised and I tell others what to do, when to do it and then report to the big guys how well ( or badly ) we may be doing.

lenders.name: Lara & Rory
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. Being financially secure is a privilege not a right.
lenders.occupational_info: She works hard, he is a stay-at-home dad (and works hard too).

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: I have been richly blessed and would like to use my resources to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students about biology.

lenders.name: Stella
lenders.loan_because: I believe that change starts with individuals.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a large hospital.

lenders.name: Virginia
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance and it takes so little to help.

lenders.name: Susan & Russ
lenders.loan_because: We believe that capitolism is the path to prosperity.
lenders.occupational_info: Owner and operator of a school and a small factory.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a differance.
lenders.occupational_info: 25 years of municipal government public works. Volunteer for 10 years on provincial and national professional councils.

lenders.name: Charles McKeever
lenders.loan_because:
1) I believe we are entrusted with resources so that we can demonstrate good stewardship while showing love to those in need. 

2) People deserve the opportunity to support themselves and to improve the 
lives of the people around them.
 
3) These entrepreneurs are an encouragement to me and a reminder that we are always blessed, even when we think we have little.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who want to create their own  business that adds value to their lives and the lives of others.
